basics.name: Andrew Zelenin
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: As a software engineer with over 7 years of experience, I have a strong background in building scalable and intuitive user interfaces for web and mobile applications. I am proficient in technologies such as React, React Native, and Flutter, which allows me to create cross-platform applications for both mobile and desktop. I am a big advocate of functional programming and strive to write clean, maintainable code that follows best practices. In addition to my technical skills, I have a broad range of interests in computer science fields such as machine learning, computer graphics, hardware architecture, and blockchain technology. I am always eager to learn new technologies and stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends.

work.name: RE:JOIN
work.summary: I recently worked on a project to build a media platform for bloggers from scratch using React Native. After conducting thorough research, I decided to rewrite the application in Flutter to improve performance and increase cross-platform compatibility.

work.name: Compli.fi
work.summary: As a Frontend Developer at a crypto startup, I played a key role in the development and design of user-friendly interfaces for our decentralized applications. Utilizing my expertise in web3, I was responsible for the technical implementation of the project. I also played an active role in the creation of smart contracts using Solidity, ensuring the security and efficiency of our blockchain platform.

work.name: Mango Techsurance
work.summary: As a key developer at a startup insurance company, I played a crucial role in the development and success of our client-facing application. Through my efforts, the application was able to acquire over 50,000 clients and become a key revenue driver for the company. I designed the application architecture and worked closely with the development team to deliver a high-quality product.

work.name: EPAM Systems
work.summary: As a frontend developer, I worked on a large-scale banking application for a major financial institution as part of a team of over 70 developers. I was a member of the core team responsible for the development and maintenance of this critical infrastructure.

work.name: Satellite Soft Labs
work.summary: I have worked as a UX designer and frontend developer on projects in the logistics industry, focusing on creating intuitive and user-friendly interfaces. I have presented on the importance and benefits of component-based UX development and helped my company adopt a React/Redux stack and establish a design system. My research and guidance have contributed to the adoption of best practices in frontend development and the improvement of the user experience.
